website_summaries.verdict: Produces bubbles while appealing to young PAW Patrol fans. Not the most durable, but still a fun option that's also affordable.
pros: Although inexpensive, this bubble machine earns praise for producing lots of bubbles
Lightweight and easy for kids to use
Kids love the popular PAW Patrol theme
cons: Build is somewhat flimsy, and some units quit working with typical use
Requires 4 AA batteries that don't come with it

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: As simple as this machine is one would think that it would last longer than a week. Ran fine the first week that we got it as we only ran it for maybe 2 days for approximately 20-30 minutes each time. The following weekend it would not run at all. Put new batteries in it and still would not run. The motor had burned up or just stopped working. Go elsewhere for a bubble machine cause this is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Geisel

customer_reviews.title: The absolute worst machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have a daycare and over the years have gone though several different bands and kinds of machines. This is by far the worst! I wish i could get my money back but it would be the same amount as the shipping.. The bubble maker sits at an angle that the hubbles actually leak into the fan area which makes a huge mess out the back. I could put up with that if it blew bubbles.. And it does for a few minutes but, then it turns into a big mess. See pictures. I will never buy one from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: kathaleen

customer_reviews.title: Save your lungs use batteries!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this item at least 10 times so far, my child has picked it up right after being filled with bubbles and it has spilled everywhere. It still works. We have not had the issues with the battery compartment getting soaked and ruining the electronics or batteries. The bubble maker produces a steady flow of bubbles after about 3 seconds of being turned on. The wands must rotate through the solution before the bubbles are blows. As long as the wind is not to strong this machine works great! it keeps my child and her friends entertained for at least a little while and as all we parents know any peaceful time is appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: D@F@DooD

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is the 3rd bubble machine I’ve purchased on here and first before I even compare it I want to give you a heads up to just buy a machine that plugs in ! You might go through bubbles quicker but the amount of bubbles will be way better and you won’t be changing out batteries. This machine only has on fan even though the opening for the blowing fan could have more to produce more bubbles and it leaks ....a lot
customer_reviews.author: Kylepluse

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great...for 45 Whole Seconds
customer_reviews.text: This worked just as described and my 2 year old was delighted with a flurry of bubbles...for about 45 seconds. (Literally) After that, the motor sounded like it had a drain in power and the fan, though it ran, didn't run fast enough to put enough air through to produce bubbles. I tried turning it off and then back on, but it never had enough power again to fully produce bubbles. I would assume that this would be a problem when batteries are drained, but I had new batteries and wouldn't expect a product to blast through them in under a minute. I picked up Billion Bubbles from a local big box store and, so far/fingers crossed, have been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: lasted only 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Ran great in initial run of 5 minutes. Tried it again an hour later and went to fill it after it stopped blowing bubbles, there was still fluid in there. So i ended up over filling and it leaked everywhere and continued to leak at the base. Motor was going and it was cycling. It was just as if the wands were not picking up the fluid. Not sure what could have gone wrong so quickly. Sending it back as defective.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of bubbles... eventually malfunctions.
customer_reviews.text: If left on it can just run through the bubbles BUT I still think it's worth it. It works perfectly fine, throws out A Lot of bubbles the kids love it. And a plus is that's it's bubble guppies as well. Update: a month into using it (end of June to July) something went wrong and it wasn't blowing out any bubbles without manual help... literally we had to blow behind the fan to get the bubbles going since our 2 year was so excited for it and would constantly ask for it until we were able to toss it out without her realizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it !
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing this because of the price. Surely a product that is going to work must cost more right? Wrong! This bubble maker takes a small a mount a bubbles to make a large quantity of bubbles. The neighborhood kids had a ball playing with this we have used it three times and there are still tons of bubbles left in the small bottle that comes with it . Don't think you have to fill up the bubble dispenser in order to get a lot of bubbles if you fill it up you will be outside with bubbles all day . I definitely recommend purchasing this bubble maker
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca wilson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite summer toy to date! This has given my son hours of fun. It works really well! I’ve bought other products that were similar and they stopped working. This bubble machine has worked really well so far and we are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It Started Out Great
customer_reviews.text: It worked great 4 times and then the bubble solution leaked into the battery compartment and rusted the springs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Niece (4yo) and Nephew (2yo) and they LOVED it. They love PAW Patrol and bubbles, so this was an easy choice. It was the one toy that they wanted to play with after unwrapping all of their gifts. Even the other kids at the party wanted to play with it and dance in the bubbles. My only recommendation is to buy extra bubble solution b/c the 4oz run out fast. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only using a few times
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months, only used a handful of times and stopped working. I'm not sure if it got wet, or bubbles got into the motor, though we really tried to keep it dry and not spill the bubbles it has stopped working. I think all bubble machines are pretty much "disposable" and won't last long at all. I was hoping this one would be different.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles for dayssss
customer_reviews.text: This bubble machine is great! It creates a TON of bubbles in a matter of seconds. Because of that, I would definitely recommend it for an outside toy. My only downfall with it is that the solution will come out if it’s knocked or tipped over. Still great entertainment for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was adequate to protect the unit. The unit works quite well. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because the motor slows down inexplicably while running leading me to believe that the life of the toy will not be very long. As far as bubbles go it does a great job for what it is designed to do. My 3-year old and I spent at least 20 minutes running back and forth through a bubble wonderland. When it dies, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R. Montrosse Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Huge dissappointment!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst bubble blower I've ever gotten. Put in the batteries but there wasn't enough power to blow sufficient air for the bubbles. My two daughters were disappointed specially because they are a huge fan of Bubble Guppies. Thought this toy would make their day but it did the opposite. I ended up purchasing a regular bubble blower and put Bubble Guppies stickers on it. Waste of Money!!!
customer_reviews.author: icoop

customer_reviews.title: but not as bad as others
customer_reviews.text: This machine kicks butt! I have seen machines that cost more than twice this eat through batteries and not perform as well. It's a little loud, but not as bad as others. It really kicks out the bubbles. It takes 4AA batteries, but I was really surprised how long our first set lasted. I love turning this on while my son plays nearby. We just watch a cloud of bubbles float and swirl. Get the Miracle Bubbles to go with this for some extra color!
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: Big bubbles
customer_reviews.text: This bubble machine always is a hit. Constant use will wear down the "motor". Be prepared for frequent battery changes. I have to admit it's a hit with the kiddies. Has brought hours of delight to my grandson. This was his second; he wore the first one out. I bought an extra because he plays with this until it becomes too cold to be outside. Makes many bubbles that will fly off in all directions!
customer_reviews.author: Hop63

customer_reviews.title: Surprised & very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually surprised at how well this bubble machine worked!! We got it for my 2 year old for Easter and he loved it. It blew non stop bubbles and a TON of them! Unfortunately he tried placing it on the counter and it fell on my tile floor and broke but that is our fault and not the product! He's upset it broke so will have to order another one! Really is a great bubble machine and what toddler doesn't love Paw Patrol?! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and cheap, but functionally is a total waste of time. The on off button is one that you have to keep pushing for the bubbles to go, you can’t just push it and leave. Unless you enjoy continuously holding a button for bubbles this is a complete and utter waste of money. Highly disappointed even for the cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Lane

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Party! LOTS of bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Tons and TONS of bubbles from this little toy. If your kids love bubbles and want LOTS of them then this is your best bet and best value. BUBBLE PARTY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it but it stop working
customer_reviews.text: My son lovessssss it .....it runs out of bubbles quick. Updating review it was a 5 but it broke a week later and tried to get in contact with the company but nothing..
customer_reviews.author: lashay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any bubble guppies fan
customer_reviews.text: Work like a charm we got it for my son's 2nd birthday he still plays with it all the time inside the house and out
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when it first arrived. We were only able to use it for a week and a half before the blower weaken so much it couldn't push out any bubbles. It was still technically blowing air, but there weren't any bubbles coming out of the machine. The spinning mechanism seemed fine and kept turning, just not enough fan power to keep operating (even after battery change). Very disappointing for my bubble-loving kids. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Minnow303

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing barely worked, straight out of the box, with brand new batteries. The motor was so slow that it barely produced any bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: msjboogz

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: upon unboxing you may think what is this little thing going to do...it puts out so many bubbles don't let the size fool you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: My nephews were so incredibly excited for this toy but it only worked half of a day. We changed out the batteries, used different bubble solution, checked for any thing stuck or in the way but bubbles stopped coming out. The fan was rotating still but it almost seemed like it stopped rotating fast enough to be able Actually produce the bubbles. Super disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love rhis for my baby! She us a huge bu bke guppie fan and loves bubbles as well! If u turn it over all the fluid will come out but this technically shouldn't be in their hands. Place it on the table or counter and watch the room fill up with bubbles!
customer_reviews.author: Kita0604

customer_reviews.title: Stock up on AA batteries.
customer_reviews.text: It works, makes tons of bubbles which is great...but you better have a stash of batteries. Not only does it go through a lot of batteries (I think i got a max of 3 days on it) but it goes through the bubble mixture fast. The reservoir where the mixture goes is not large at all and the machine has a bunch of wands so you have to constantly refill it. It's nice but we've decided to shop for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: OJay

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of these now and they both don't work. The first one lasted through 2uses before breaking, this one came not working. My husband and friend have torn them apart to get them to work but it only lasts 1-3 times before it's not working again....super bummed cause my boys love paw patrols and are bubble obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I order. The quality of the product was great.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Worked like it should
customer_reviews.text: If your little one loves bubbles then they'll love this bubble machine. We went through a lot of bubble solution this summer. Worked great
customer_reviews.author: Loretta M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it! He was so happy with this gift. He was jumping and we all had a great time! One of my favorite purchases so far!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia G. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great toy that is still performing well
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked really well. My son loves the bubbles. The bubbles are smaller size and come out in bunches. The batteries have lasted several weeks now as we only play with it once or twice a week for 5-10 mins. The only downside is you have to hold it up higher as the bubbles tend to blow downward. If you have a ceiling fan on, turn it off when using this or your bubbles won't have a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Collins

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE bubbles. Sadly
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE bubbles. Sadly, this is the second one ( of the same) I have bought. They break within 10 mins of opening. You can't drop it or let the bubbles tip over because them it gets the motor wet and doesn't work. 😤
customer_reviews.author: K, CA

customer_reviews.title: A little leaky but great!
customer_reviews.text: Machine works great and has a relatively quiet motor but shoots out so many bubbles, it's best suited for outside use. It also began leaking after about the 10th use. All in all, my kid loves it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Inca

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the bad reviews on this and was hesitant but bought it anyways. I put Duracell batteries in it, keep it completely flat at all times while using, and fill the bubbles up to the top and it’s worked perfectly!!! My little ones loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: nkah31821

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son over the summer. He enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My Grand daughter absolutely loved this toy and plays with it non-stop.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R. Duke

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this! Had it for ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this! Had it for about a week now. My advice is to buy more of Fubbles brand bubble solution that this product comes with. The tiny bottle only lasts about 2 days of on & off use, and Miracle Bubble brand solution doesn't produce as many bubbles in this machine.
customer_reviews.author: jessica devaney

customer_reviews.title: So terrible. The bubbles leaked out of the machine into ...
customer_reviews.text: So terrible. The bubbles leaked out of the machine into the motor and battery area. This corroded the batteries and made foam spray out the back at the motor. I'm sure it's a hazard to have liquid in the motor. It never even blew a bubble. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: r14

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for a 3 year old and she loved it. I wish I had bought one for my son as well!
customer_reviews.author: Francine M

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome! Except the batteries do not last long at all
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: Saves mom from blowing endlessly. Makes a lot of bubbles. It works best when you have fresh batteries. Once the batteries start to weaken the bubbles slow down. We used rechargeable batteries to resolve the issue. UPDATE: it did not survive a 1 story fall off the deck. I will get another one next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bubble lover!
customer_reviews.text: Works great just don’t let your kid pick it up or it will spill.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Batteries overheated and melted.
customer_reviews.text: While this was adorable and fun at first, after only a couple of uses, the batteries overheated and melted the entire housing compartment. Very dangerous while the kids were playing with it. Luckily no one was burned.
customer_reviews.author: RachelPW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We use this nearly every night at bath time. My kids love it and so far has held up against a 16 month old and a 3 yr old. It also seems to me that this runs for an incredible amount of time with little bubble mixture and sends out ALOT of bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars because it was fun the little time it lasted
customer_reviews.text: We used it one day Easter buy the end of the day well the few hours we played with it the bubbles were no longer blowing bubbles in the machine and batteries??? 2 stars because it was fun the little time it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lots and lots and lots of bubbles for the first couple of hours of using... As other buyers said it starts to slow down to a halt and makes a weird. noise. I have not tried inserting new batteries yet to see if cranks up again but for the price a great addition for a birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 3 year old and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nephew Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4 year old nephew for Christmas last year. He loved it !! Make sure to have extra bubble juice and batteries on hand, he wouldn't turn it off!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: The switch on the machine only lasted for a very short time. We used it three times and today for the fourth time the switch did not work. A sad day for the little ones. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Harry F

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with the product -- it didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the product -- it didn't work at all! I followed the directions but it seemed there was something stuck in the fan part which prevented it from turning. No bubbles at all. My two granddaughters were completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Junk.... don’t waste money on this disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even waste your money. My daughter was so excited only to be let down by junk. Our brand new batteries in it. Half a bottle of her bubbles only for it to not blow bubbles. It worked, the wands moved, but the motor doesn’t have enough power to make any bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: So far it has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: purchased it as a gift for my friends daughter. She loves jumping in all the bubbles. So far it has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Runs out of bubble mixture fast
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my child's birthday party in the park. Not sure if this is the case with all bubble machines but it went through the bubble mixture really fast. Luckily one of the guests was happy to be in charge of replenishing the mixture but I don't know if I'll be using this bubble machine much in future as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This bubble machine is quite possibly one of the worst I've purchased. It is super cute! And that is about all it really has going for it. I replaced and put brand new batteries in 2 times and it did not even blow one bubble out. Very disappointed! I ended up having to return this item and just went to the store to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sikes

customer_reviews.title: Really produces 100's of colorful bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at the amounts of bubbles it produces. A little tricky to move around, can spill, but necessary to adjust according to wind direction. Kids spend hours chasing the colorful bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Plastic garbage
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this until the batteries corroded after 3 uses. I tried to use new batteries and still nothing. It's not worth the money to get 3 uses out of it and then have an upset toddler because there's no more bubbles. I would like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Rob hannah

customer_reviews.title: Best bubble machine!
customer_reviews.text: We've had a bubble machine before we bought this one had no idea a bubble machine could be so powerful anf blow so many bubbles!! This is amazing!! It blows TONS of bubbles with very little solution. Our 2 year old absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: scrally

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. The machine ran and the fan moved but the number of bubbles was pathetic and it was messy. This requires 100% participation by an adult and even with that it still creates a terrible sticky mess. We have had other bubble machines but I bought this one because it had the Paw. Patrol crew on it. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it but every time he touched it he would dump the bubble solution out and of course he was only interested in it if he could touch it. Then it broke after only a month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: If you have kids that love bubbles it's a must.
customer_reviews.text: My twins LOVE. And it gives me a break at blowing. Goes through AAA fairly fast, however we have been using a lot. So make sure you have extra ready to go. Easy to use, but would keep out of excited hands seems like it could break easy.
customer_reviews.author: TWINmommyof2

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: It does make a little mess so you gonna pay attention to it but apart from that, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tanese

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product, my son loves the bubbles but is scared of the sound of the motor running lol.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a DAY. Now all it does it rotate and the bubbles just goop up! So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stokas

customer_reviews.title: disappointed 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: just recieved it got it all set up fresh batteries , filled bubble soap it comes with. call me 3 year old outside all excited to see nothing. no bubbles. its like fan wasnt strong enough. put hand in front of it could barely feel fan. it was clearly moving but nothing. will be returning most likely
customer_reviews.author: Confliction

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: This bubbler is wonderful! It's blows tons of bubbles! It is a little loud when used indoors but it's prefect for outdoors! I like that it is portable and light weight. It came as expected and meet all my expectations. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My kids love it. We bought it for a birthday party and it was a hit
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Goken

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace another bubble blower that leaked into the battery compartment. The original blower worked great up until that point. This one never worked. It does not blow enough air to actually make any bubbles form. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT recommend buying this bubble machine
customer_reviews.text: The batteries will die with in a hour of use. I have had change the batteries so many times that it would have been less costly to buy one of the larger bubble makers that they use at weddings or other large events. I do NOT recommend buying this bubble machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun times!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son loves it. I just hate how loud the machine is : /
customer_reviews.author: Cecile

customer_reviews.title: Wait for it
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long while to work but is great once it does.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost two year old grandchild. He loves bubbles and can't blow, so this is a great toy for him. He loves all the bubbles and chasing after them. This makes lots of big bubbles and keeps him entertained. He likes picking it up and moving it. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Makes lots of bubbles the first couple times. However, the bubble liquid leaks over the side and infiltrates the battery compartment underneath. Overnight, our batteries corroded and the bubble machine would not operate. Cleaned it up, dried it out, put new batteries in, it turned back on. Again, overnight the soap corroded the batteries and it once again does not work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: helena joyce

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for kids who like bubbles.  Could use bigger reservoir
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyable bubble machine for kiddos. It's kind of cheaply made, but brings a lot of joy to the kiddo. I wish the reservoir was bigger so that I wasn't refilling the machine as often, but that's about my only true complaint.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ivy Boyter

customer_reviews.title: Defective/ poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: Battery compartment was put together improperly one whole side is missing the negative positive strips to hold batteries in place can’t even use it. What a waste of product. Seems from other reviews this is pretty common.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this item for my son. I got it out put batteries in it, filled it with bubbles, and turned it on and waiting long then the 45 seconds it tells you to wait and still no bubbles. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee chinn

customer_reviews.title: This bubble blower is made of cheap materials. Did ...
customer_reviews.text: This bubble blower is made of cheap materials. Did not last long as the motor got stuck and the plastic cracked at even the slightest abuse. This is a product for children so it is expected they would be build stronger
customer_reviews.author: Sean Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile
customer_reviews.text: It broke when it fell from the table, and leaks a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: which is great, but it is surprisingly noisy
customer_reviews.text: This blows a lot of bubbles, which is great, but it is surprisingly noisy, and it is hard not to spill the solution if you need to move the machine. There is no cap to it, so if you don't use up all the solution, you're kind of stuck.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bass

customer_reviews.title: my toddler loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old was ENTHRALLED with this. He's both a Paw Patrol and a bubble fan, so this was the perfect gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: J McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: goes through batteries too fast
customer_reviews.text: Even if I only use it for half an hour the next time I go to use it I have to replace the batteries. That can get expensive when LO wanna use it every day. Amazon replaced it but the second one did the same thing. Wont buy buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LWillner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but....
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but the machine can't keep the bubble going for a long time, it seems to pitter out after about 5-10 min then we have to turn it off and let it rest for 5-10 min. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Becky E.

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Fun!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the bubble machine. My two year old has had so much fun with this! Just an FYI- batteries not included and the bubbles included lasted about 30 minutes so be prepared to buy extra bubble syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great, with no
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves bubbles and this thing sure puts out the bubbles. He loves it. It has worked great, with no problems
customer_reviews.author: J Combs

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and it doesnt work anymore. Can't return it either because we are 10 days past the return period. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kinzel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bubbles leaked out and when it was knocked over (by a toddler) it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Keene

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this but it needs to last a lot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's paw patrol birthday party and it lasted all of 20 minutes before the solution began to leak into the batteries. I wanted to love this but it needs to last a lot longer
customer_reviews.author: michelle martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 2nd Birthday and she loves it! Blows a TON of bubbles. Also a plus is that it's Bubble Guppies, which she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Cknels

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son. He loves it. The little thing really puts out a lot of bubbles. Much better than I was expecting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D

customer_reviews.title: This has stopped working after 35 days of having it ...
customer_reviews.text: This has stopped working after 35 days of having it. I have changed the batteries several times and it will only blow 1 -2 bubbles at a time. Wish it was working the way it did when we first got it... :-( And of course its past the 30 of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaked bubbles into battery compartment on first day. Stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It gave bubbles only for some time, returned it as it was defective. May be just what i got was not well, I had friends who bought it and had great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Karthisbaby

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The product never worked from the beginning. The rotator doesn't go fast enough to make bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Walrath

customer_reviews.title: ... party and it was a huge hit the toddlers loved playing in the bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my daughters 2nd birthday party and it was a huge hit the toddlers loved playing in the bubbles, I wish i had broke it out at the beginning of the party I Love it
customer_reviews.author: vikki

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun and no one runs out of air
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loved this and it was easy for him to use on his own when mom and dad weren't fast enough with the bubble refills.
customer_reviews.author: TheNikki714

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this thing. I'm very happy with it but I wish it had a bigger well to put the bubbles in. I have to fill it often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it because grandma doesn't have to keep blowing the bubbles out. The machine does it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bubble machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3 yr old!!! He absolutely loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: A great bubble machine.  Blows lots of great bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are big fans of PAW patrol, so we knew this would be a great gift for them. This machine is so easy to use and blows tons of bubbles. This is a perfect gift for kids who have a hard time blowing bubbles themselves. Even our cat got in on the act and tried chasing the bubbles. So much fun to watch kids laugh and giggle and the cat almost doing somersaults trying to catch them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

product_meta.title: Little Kids Paw Patrol Bubble Machine
product_meta.description: Style:Paw Patrol SkyeA new motorized Bubble Machine that blows tons of bigger, better bubbles! Available in your favorite Nickelodeon styles: Shimmer & Shine, PAW Patrol, Dora & Friends, Bubble Guppies, and Sponge Bob Square Pants. Easy and fun for kids to use! Simply pour bubbles in the front of the machine, push the button and the fun begins! The moving wands blow continuous bubbles for tons of bubble fun! Requires 4 "AA" batteries, not included. Includes 4 fl oz of premium bubble solution. Ages 3 & up.
feature_bullets: Turn on the motor to start blowing bubbles
Includes 4 fl oz of bubble solution
Fun PAW Patrol graphic on front of machine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
